name: Public Goods for Advancing the Field of Token Engineering
description: Education is a positive sum game. TE Academy has attracted more than 3,000 students to its TE Fundamentals education program focused on designing, verifying, and optimizing token-based systems. Token engineering is a new, crypto-native domain in its own right. This talk is about how we structure our program, how we've built our community, our vision for education as a public good, and how we apply incentive design to our student community.
